text: François Cluzet (born 21 September 1955) is a French actor. ==Biography== Cluzet grew up in Paris, he made his debut in 1976. Cluzet's biggest hit is Intouchable, the movie is known as The Intouchables in English regions. Cluzet has a son named Paul, whose mother was actress Marie Trintignant. Cluzet has 3 other children: Blanche, Joseph and Marguerite. ==Notable filmography== Year Title Role Director 1979 Cocktail Molotov Bruno Diane Kurys 1980 The Horse of Pride Pierre-Alain, the father
